mapper.select: SELECT bt.id , bt.title , bt.content , bt.viewQty , bt.likeQty , bt.createDt , ut.nickname AS createName , bt.createId , bt.updateDt , bt.deleteYn , bt.majorId FROM board_dept_tbl bt LEFT JOIN user_tbl ut ON bt.createId = ut.id WHERE bt.id = #{id}

SELECT bt.id , bt.title ,(SELECT count(*) FROM comment_tbl WHERE boardType = 'free' AND boardId = bt.id AND deleteYn = false) AS countComment , bt.content , bt.viewQty , bt.likeQty , bt.createDt , bt.createId , ut.nickname AS createName , bt.updateDt , bt.deleteYn FROM board_dept_tbl bt LEFT JOIN user_tbl ut ON bt.createId = ut.id WHERE bt.deleteYn = false AND ${searchType} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchName},'%') AND bt.majorId = #{majorId} ORDER BY ${orderByWord} LIMIT #{rowsOnePage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

mapper.update: UPDATE board_dept_tbl SET viewQty = viewQty + 1 WHERE deleteYn = false AND id = #{id}
UPDATE board_dept_tbl SET likeQty = likeQty + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND deleteYn = false
UPDATE board_dept_tbl SET likeQty = likeQty - 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND deleteYn = false
